headline: Where Will AT&T Stock Be in 1 Year?
summary: AT&T's stock price has risen as the company refocused on its core telecom business.  The 2020s did not start well for AT&T (NYSE: T) stock.  In the 2010s, the company veered from the wireless-focused business models of its competitors and invested heavily in non-core businesses such as DirecTV satellite TV services and Time Warner entertainment.

headline: Stock-Split Watch: Is AT&T Next?
summary: The most recent AT&T stock split was a 1-for-5 reverse split in 2002.  The telecom company has announced share buybacks.  AT&T (NYSE: T) has been one of the better defensive stocks in 2025, as it's currently up 20.2% on the year.
